headline: Akamai’s Cybersecurity And Cloud Shift Reframes Valuation And Growth Prospects
summary: Akamai Technologies (NasdaqGS:AKAM) is shifting its business focus toward cybersecurity, cloud computing, and edge services. This transition marks a move away from reliance on its traditional content delivery network operations. The company is repositioning its platform to address higher margin areas within security and distributed cloud infrastructure. Akamai built its reputation as a content delivery network provider, helping customers move data and media efficiently across the internet...
